solution_line_template: If one tarantula egg sac can contain {tarantulas_per_sac} tarantulas, then four egg sacs can hold {effective_egg_sacs}*{tarantulas_per_sac}={total_tarantulas} tarantula babies.

If each tarantula baby has {legs_per_tarantula} legs, the 4 egg sacs can contain {total_tarantulas}*{legs_per_tarantula}=<<{total_tarantulas}*{legs_per_tarantula}={total_legs}>>{total_legs} baby tarantula legs.
